title: PSP SNES9XTYL0.4.2ME LATEST VERSION COMPLETE (U) [!] ROMSET
description:
Here is the latest SNES9X for PSP
to run on PSP put folder in PSP/GAME

EVERYTHINGS READY SETUP TO PLAY JUST DRAG AND DROP

OK I FIGURED OUT THE PROBLEM
THE FOLDER HAS TO BE RENAMED
THE PSP DOESEN'T LIKE (U) [!] SO IT SHOWS CORRUPTED DATA

SIMPLY RENAME THE FOLDER TO SNES9X OR W/E WHEN YOU PUT ON YOUR STICK IN PSP GAME.

SORRY ABOUT THIS.

Whats special about this torrent is the romset included
I extracted only the good verified dumps (U) [!] from
goodSNES 2.0.4 GoodMerged then zipped the good dumps at BEST
compression using WinRar all manually at my PC so was sure not to miss any relying on some program. Damn im glad it's finished.

I hope all enjoy this work and people will say this is the best SNES romset ever

I also included the best jap to english translations roms about 20 or so
plus EVERY RETAIL USA SUPER NINTENDO GAME RELEASED.
which is over 750+ games.

Unfortunately the emulator crashes when there's over 500+ roms in a folder so I had to make ROM1 and ROM2 folders so games can be launched without freezing/crashing the emulator.
By pressing triangle after LOAD ROM option you can point to either folder and load what you wish to.

OH yeah there's cheats for some games also

--------------- CHEATS------------------
Depending on game person is running, once it's launched, press home and hit left or right arrow pad a few times
you will see a cheat option. I have named all the codes so you can easily see what effect it has on the game.
If the codes are enabled but don't seem to be working the trick is to toggle the option disable all codes option then,
press X to go back in the game this "refreshes" things then press home and choose enable all codes or pick some that you like
and they will work.

For EX chrono trigger has get level 99 after 1 battle, all weapons, all items, all techs, many other codes which make it alot of fun.
Or if you don't wanna cheat simply disable them all and play legit.

I hope everyone enjoys this work. Leave comments or questions and I will answer them HAVE FUN
